extendedInfo.description: Download the jcpenney app and stay up to date with our latest sales, coupons and doorbusters. Shop your favorite brands, like Arizona, St. John's Bay, Liz Claiborne and Royal Velvet, and explore some of our newcomers, like Joe Fresh, MarthaHome and Happy Chic by Jonathan Adler. Planning to register at jcpenney? Just download our app and you can use your smartphone as your scanner. Register in store or wherever you are, and manage your registry from anywhere at your convenience. Our registry tool will keep you covered from your first shower to your last thank-you. FeaturesShop anytimeâyour schedule is our schedule.Use your jcp Rewards toward future purchases.Shop with your jcp card and other forms of payment, including PayPal.Customize searches to find more fits, sizes, brands and colors, all at great prices.Ship to your home or your nearest jcp store for easy pick-up.Keep track of all your orders in progress.Read helpful customer reviews to find out what's hot.Find the jcpenney store nearest you.Easily pay your jcp credit card bill.Save and share favorite items with friends.Gift Registry FeaturesMemory Marker - use this handy timeline to mark planning milestones along your journey. You can add icons into the timeline, make it an event and even invite friends to attend (a dress fitting, for example) through Facebook.Gift Tracker - keep track of the items that have been purchased for you and manage your thank-you notes.Video Thank-Yous - video thank-you notes are a fun way to say "thanks" when an inbox is better than a mailbox.

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Tried putting in my cvc code for my credit card and wouldnt let me. Spent over half hour trying to check out because of the errors I kept getting on pages!
reviews.author: David Majorz

reviews.title: IPhone port
reviews.comment: Crappy crashy iPhone app. Android apps don\'t need a back button on-screen. Android phones have a hardware back button.
reviews.author: Dwayne Smith

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: If you know exactly what you\'re looking for you\'re fine. I downloaded this to browse around for our wedding registry. You get the first page of results but if you try to navigate to another page of results you get the entire 50k+ items on the site in no particular order. Fail.
reviews.author: Deborah Murphy

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I\'ve been trying to shop online using this app & every time I try to narrow my search, it never actually happens. Huge waste of time.
reviews.author: Angie Nelson

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can\'t refine search. You have to look at ALL curtains, purses, blouses whatever. You can\'t look for a specific size or color you must scroll through all the dreck. Descriptions are pointless (ex: purses have \"metal\" grommets. Not silver, gold, brass, etc.) You can not store gift cards either. Pointless app.
reviews.author: River V.

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Crap app!!! Won\'t even open. Don\'t waste your time. If you guys ever fix it, let us all know..we might try again!!
reviews.author: Heidi Yunk

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Absolutely positively definitely useless.
reviews.author: Ahmad Abdelhadi

reviews.title: If an item is out of stock, MARK IT \'OUT OF STOCK\'
reviews.comment: Before I get to the part where I pick my size....and THEN find out it is out of stock. Cmon jcp! Even the walmart app does that!
reviews.author: Ann Culpepper

reviews.title: Love JCP but not the ap
reviews.comment: I love shopping at JCP but the ap doesn\'t work properly...hope it is fixed soon otherwise it is a waste.
reviews.author: Tina Berry

reviews.title: Freezes after 1st product selection
reviews.comment: I\'m looking forward to JC Penny\'s comeback. It is one of my favorite stores from back in the day. However this app will not help their reputation.  I downloaded this app to my Android. It freezes after the first product selection and then crashes.
reviews.author: Diana Sundukos

reviews.title: Dissatisfied
reviews.comment: Cant zoom in to hit next or see producs that you searched for. Dissatisfied.
reviews.author: Shanna Bridges

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Downloaded 3x this year to see if problems were fix and still a 0 star for me. Lags, beyond slow, nothing is available. Garbage app.
reviews.author: Asheley McNeil

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: No web surfing.
reviews.author: Galo Cruz Cruz

reviews.title: Come on!
reviews.comment: This app is absolutely horrendous. It\'s slow as hell, and ugly as hell.   JCP is a great store, but you guys really need to revamp your app. It sucks.
reviews.author: Destry Tosh

reviews.comment: It always takes long to load and is always crashing
reviews.author: val fer

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Mone Bethea

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t always load, never let\'s you go to next page, really stinks!
reviews.author: Dawn Binder

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Constantly locks up and shuts down
reviews.author: Joan Siler

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.comment: Don\'t know what all the complaints are about. Works just like it should! Love it!
reviews.author: Bridget McCune

reviews.title: Greatest
reviews.comment: Cloth my Grandkkids
reviews.author: Suzanne Burgin
